'''Thunderbolting Across the Land (II)''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Inazuma: The Islands of Thunder and Eternity - Series II]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to unlock all [[Teleport Waypoints]] in the [[Watatsumi Island]] and [[Seirai Island]] areas of Inazuma.
